verses.name: 1 Kings 11:37
verses.text: And I will take thee, and thou shalt reign according to all that thy soul desireth, and shalt be king over Israel.

verses.name: 1 Kings 11:38
verses.text: And it shall be, if thou wilt hearken unto all that I command thee, and wilt walk in my ways, and do that is right in my sight, to keep my statutes and my commandments, as David my servant did; that I will be with thee, and build thee a sure house, as I built for David, and will give Israel unto thee.

verses.name: 1 Kings 11:39
verses.text: And I will for this afflict the seed of David, but not for ever.
